name: GJ5 Films
text: The girls working there are really welcoming to their customers. Have friendly and attentive attitude. For me i had a special instruction for avoiding meat contact for which my server instructed in the kitchen to use a different knife to cut. And the pizza was piping hot to its perfection. Keep it up guys.

name: Shemeka Darnlet
text: The new manager faith is doing a fabulous job turning this location around.  I see friendly cashiers and the food seems to be fresher. I enjoyed my last visit and definitely will be returning in the very near future especially because my kids love Pizza Hut.

name: Pragnesh Angiwala
text: The girls working there are very welcoming and they take utmost care to get your order right. For me when i instructed to avoid meat contact, she made sure and further instructed in the kitchen to use another knife to cut my pizza. Pizza was made and baked to perfection. So tasty it was and yea on time delivery/carry out.
